text:
RT @RepJayapal 70% of Americans support expanding access to quality, affordable health care through a Medicare for All program. 

It’s time to give the American people what they want. It’s time for Medicare for All.
https://www.salon.com/2018/11/19/time-for-medicare-for-all_partner/

.@ShariceDavids, these — and other issues — are the priorities of the people who have been brushed aside by the Republican special interest agenda. Together, we will deliver progress and fairness. Thank you for your support. —NP http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dszy1SpWkAAdNd_.jpg

Pharmaceutical corporate greed is literally killing people who cannot afford their medication. Together, we can change that. @SSWorks http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1066346993071652864/img/L44b_aF5MGecrUe8.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1066346993071652864/vid/240x240/bfPdKkUI9RYy1YhW.mp4?tag=8

This is what a rigged economy is all about. Sears wants to pay its executives as much as $25 million in bonuses after they closed hundreds of stores & let go of thousands of workers. It's time to build an economy that works for all of us, not just the 1%. https://www.cnn.com/2018/11/16/business/sears-executive-bonuses/index.html

Today is Small Business Saturday, a day to support small businesses which create 2 out of every 3 jobs in our country. Please support your local small business today and #ShopSmall! Learn more: https://www.sba.gov/saturday

Small businesses are the backbone of our country’s economy, with nearly 4 million in California alone. Take some time today to #ShopSmall at your local small businesses, and let’s recognize today and every day the critical role they play to helping our communities thrive.

Marriott is one of the most profitable hotel companies in the world, yet many of their workers struggle to make ends meet. I stand with @unitehere and the 5,000 hotel workers on the picket line in Hawaii and California fighting for a living wage. https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/marriott-strike-hawaii-san-francisco-boston_us_5bf4ffa4e4b0eb6d93099dd9
A job should lift workers out of poverty, not keep them in it. One job should be enough for people to live with security and dignity.

Climate change is already happening – and we are not doing enough to stop it. If we don’t take aggressive action now, we risk destroying our environment – and our economy. We all have a stake in this, so we all need to work together to fix it. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/11/23/climate/us-climate-report.html

RT @Nataliew1020 To my supporters, don't worry about me. I get variatiations of ignorance daily. It doesn't hurt me anymore. Just want you all to know the hate that exists toward disabled kids.  

We've had a lovely day decorating for Xmas. We are filled w/ Love & Happiness. I'm a lucky mama! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DszCSFKU4AAJbSP.jpg

In the midst of the worst drug overdose crisis in US history, a pharmaceutical company Kaleo increased the price sixfold for their version of the life-saving drug, Naloxone. The greed of Big Pharma is killing Americans and it has got to stop. https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2018/11/19/18103361/opioid-overdose-naloxone-evzio-drug-prices

After a 5 year anomaly, order has been restored. #GatorNation trending up. Great win & great future ahead for THE University of #Florida. #GoGators https://twitter.com/gatorsfb/status/1066430484970901504 QT @GatorsFB http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dsy42qbWkAI7PjY.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dsy42q7XcAI7HbN.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dsy42suWsAMQteU.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dsy42p4XgAEOyLI.jpg

We are all profoundly grateful for you, @AdyBarkan. Your passion for saving our health care and charting a new path for progressive change were an inspiration throughout the campaign. Your labor of love helped us win the House in order to deliver #ForThePeople. –NP http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsyKoTsUcAAZ2f-.jpg

My plan would encourage companies to transition from fossil fuels to cleaner energy sources, and help reduce the risks of an environmental and financial catastrophe. https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/elizabeth-warren-climate-disclosure-bill_us_5b9b6381e4b013b097795efb
